value:
The Book of Naga was once wielded
by Saint Heim, but instead of my
brother Julius, or Lord Seliph...$k$p...I was the one who inherited it.
But...why? Why me?

Thanks to Lord Seliph, I have found
meaning in my life. I will strive for the
sake of the world and all its people.

The festival will continue for a while
longer, so please do not be afraid to
get some rest if you become fatigued.

This festival exists to remember the
wills of our ancestors and the blood
they passed down to us.

For as long as I have known them,
Lord Seliph and Lord Leif have
been inseparable.

Oh no... I'm sorry, but
I would like to return to
$Nf's castle now...

Prayer brings light... And light
becomes the white dragon that
will vanquish the black dragon!

As one descended from Saint Heim,
I will take the book of light and pray
to the heavens...
May Naga protect us...

Thank you. I appreciate that you
thought to give me this.

I am Julia... As a descendant of
Saint Heim, I will perform a rite
to ensure a wonderful festival.

Even though this is a festival...my
outfit is not very different from what
I normally wear, is it?$k$pHehe... I thought the same thing. But
it seems my usual attire is quite
similar to what Saint Heim once wore.$k$pSpeaking of similarities... It is curious
that our god of light shares her name
with a god from other worlds.$k$pEven in worlds beyond my own,
darkness is born, and light
arrives to chase it away...$k$pI pray that Naga's great purpose
transcends worlds...and brings
peace to all people.
たあっ
どうです？
きゃあっ
It can't be...!
Saint Heim...
Grant me your power.
Let us give thanks.
To bring peace to this land.
I am sorry...
giggle...
This festival is dedicated to the 12 crusaders.
Hm? Oh, you must be excited for the festival, too.
A sacred Brand appears on the body of each direct descendant of a crusader.
Under Saint Heim's great leadership, the people were able to free themselves from the Loptr Empire's control.
Only Naga can be used against the dark god... And I am the only one that can use it.
Where could Lord Seliph—my brother...be? I would like to enjoy the festival with him.
You are unfamiliar with this festival, I think. Allow me to tell you a little about it.
I will go.
Oh?
Please guide me.
